info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 4:26PM CDT until March 30 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT FOR JACKSON COUNTY... At 426 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Murphysboro, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Murphysboro, Carbondale, De Soto, Elkville and Hurst. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central and southern Illinois...and southeastern Missouri. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
